attributes.action: force rural councils to spend more on improving the rural road network and stopping road flooding.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Often the rural road network is left to degenerate into an appalling state. The road surface is never repaired and full of potholes. The roads are liable to flood from ditches and water run off from hills. The councils claim lack of money whilst often wasting money on unsuccessful failures and white elephant projects.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Roads-bypasses/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
